name: Classic Solitaire Cell
description:
Let’s play amazing cool and popular solitaire card game.

It’s Classic Solitaire game for single player. We carefully designed a fresh modern look, woven into the wonderful classic feel that everyone loves.

Experience the crisp, clear, and easy to read cards, simple and quick animations, and subtle sounds, in either landscape view.

You can move cards with a single tap or drag them to their destination. You can either play the easy Draw 1 games where most games are winnable, or if you feel up-to the challenge, try your luck with Draw 3 and Vegas play modes.

===================================
TOP FEATURES OF CLASSIC SOLITAIRE GAME
===================================
- Customise Backgrounds.
- Improve your skill with Solitaire
- Easy user interface.
- More time spending.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for play this game? Don’t forget review us!
